data.name: Hellscreen Demo
data.detailed_description: The Hellscreen demo is a little 30-40 min taster from the first episode which releases in October.
data.about_the_game: The Hellscreen demo is a little 30-40 min taster from the first episode which releases in October.
data.short_description: The Hellscreen demo is a little 30-40 min taster from the first episode which releases in October.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
